showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ , and the staff was very nice and friendly. Laundry machines were very well kept, and the shower was very inexpensive only $13 and had great water pressure with plenty of hot water. Parking was available at practically all hours, which is ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ or get gas. They have pretty good food menu and offer all kinds of snacks and beverages needed for a road trip. They also sell a lot of merchandise and souvenir kind of items. They have clean restrooms and also offer shower and lounge.
Shower was excellent,  Clean and hot! Shrimp taco was really good too! I'd definitely come back!

‚Ä¶ time through but now they won‚Äôt accept AMBEST and Mudflap together so I saved 6 cents with Mudflap bought a 100 gallon so I saved 6$ now they say i have to pay them to shower to and it‚Äôs 18$ what a joke i won‚Äôt ever buy fuel here again
New travel stop with several Tesla charging stations. Has clean restrooms with laundry and shower for truckers.

Showers cost $13, gives you towel (small and large), soap is gojo near shower wall. Shower #3 has low water pressure, but the water can get extremely hot.  They tend to want to give this shower every time I go.  Today I got Shower #2.  Show ‚Ä¶

Newly opened..great food and good services..
Great for truck drivers..
Only one problem, don't get me wrong but it's no drain on the floor outside the shower..

Newly open destination base Travel Center/truck stop. . Krispy Crunchy Chicken, pizza at their Kitchen. Truckers lounge, shower and more. Truckers accessories and  huge assortment of Novelty items. Clean washrooms and friendly staff. All ‚Ä¶

Everything you think or wish to have for long distance travel is available inside . Fresh and delicious hot food and drinks and coffee, frozen smoothies, ice cream  and also clean restrooms and shower facilities

Very nice facility!
I read other reviews about this place and some people were not impressed, but I think it's pretty nice here. The shower room I got was clean and at a reasonable ‚Ä¶
Very nice clean TA. Plenty of parking lots. Clean showers/restrooms. Ihop was clean and neat. Service was amazing. Alot of TAs are beat but this one definitely one of my best ones.

Place is ok. I love that is haves a bigger food stand better then other Flying J. Now when going to the men bathroom remember to go all the way after the laundry to the left. ‚Ä¶ and how polite, professional, and real he was. The store offers several advantages that my partner and I are going to look into taking advantage of moving forward. If you get a hundred gallons of fuel you get a free coffee and or shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ covid clean when i was there. Staff didn't wear masks but they were cleaning. The handle in the shower we used was cold hot opposite and we didn't figure it out till the end of the shower. Burrrrr. Thank goodness we showered at a warm ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Bathrooms are dirty glass doors falling on you during your shower. Pee still in toilet as well as dirty clothes. Was qouted 10 dollars on the phone for shower. Once there charged 15.59. Do not go here go to Pilot or Loves

‚Ä¶ to purchase fuel.  They definitely had the best fuel prices ; which is all that is worth mentioning.  Had to purchase  100 gallons to get a shower.  The attendant escorted me back to the shower and I see him quickly crab a towel off of the ‚Ä¶

I fueled here and I wanted to take a shower as well. After putting diesel I moved to a parking spot and went into the store to pay and get my shower. The guy at the counter comes out running, tells me and my husband to wait a moment and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The store itself contains a thorough selection of traditional convenience store snacks, beverages, and alcohol. In addition to modest restrooms it features a separate shower area. There is also a business area but it is currently closed. ‚Ä¶
Good fuel prices. Shower was clean,towel ,too. Coffee was fresh

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad Love‚Äôs. Parking is not as limited as it seems ‚Äî there‚Äôs an extra spot by the hotel where you can park as well. The area itself is decent, and the staff is friendly. Showers, though, are old and could definitely use an upgrade. This Love‚Äôs would really benefit from some modernization.

This place is a horrible rat trap.... Wow!!! Truck parking is laid out horribly.... It's a small old loves, so that IS expected.... I did find a spot though, so thumps up for that.... Long wait for showers....  Has a boring subway in it.... ‚Ä¶

This place was packed. Folks everywhere.
Clean restroom üöΩ coffee needed attention but it was early in the morning so maybe customers wiped it out. ‚Ä¶

Horrible place to come to.
The lady at the front looked like she didn‚Äôt even want to be there I asked her if she can open a shower since the women‚Äôs restroom had a line and she said I had ‚Ä¶

Worst love
Old lady working in the night doesn‚Äôt want to clean the showers. Also seems like rude. Showers are dirty as hell
For an $18 shower it sure is dirty they really don‚Äôt bother to use any chemicals or even look in the shower I found someone‚Äôs soap dish and mirror is really dirty and the fan is just disgusting

Waiting here for last 30mints nobody wants to clean the washroom one of the staff member who cleans the washroom she‚Äôs just going back-and-forth. I asked her why are you not cleaning and she‚Äôs just making a faces

Fueling island needs to be power washed nightly.  Shower facilities need torn down and redone.  You should never have cracked concrete in the fueling island, it damages your tire.

Helpful staff! Low on the four star just because of the shower door. Y'all need to get that fixed. Don't be cheap with the chain lock, get a real lock and make the doors shut all the way. ‚Ä¶
